name: EpilepsyWithoutStatusEpilepticusICD9CM
title: Epilepsy without status epilepticus ICD9CM
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains ICD9CM concepts for epilepsy without status epilepticus),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people diagnosed with epilepsy. This element may map to "Diagnosis" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Epilepsy),(Exclusion Criteria: Status epilepticus)
